edit.type_error: This type of file cannot be edited via our control panel.
edit.daemon_error: Unable to connect to the daemon.
edit.no_file: No file was specified that can be edited.
edit.error: You can return to the file manager by clicking here.

ajax.no_dir: Unable to locate request directory. Error logged.
ajax.file_404: The file specified could not be found on the server.
ajax.no_dl: Unable to connect to the server to get the files. Please try again.
ajax.no_edit: This type of file cannot be edited via our online file manager. Please use a FTP client.

overview.collect_disk: Collecting disk usage information, this could take a few seconds.

ajax.no_exec: Unable to execute command on the server.
ajax.no_conn: Unable to connect to the node.

overview.space_used: You are using %s MB of your maximum %s MB of disk space.
overview.collect_usage: Attempting to collect usage information, this could take a few seconds. Please ensure server is online.

ajax.generic_error: An error was encountered with this AJAX request.

console.scrollstop_alert: You have selected text in the console. The console will not auto-update when this occurs. This is done to allow you to easily copy or select text in the console. To allow for automatic refreshing again simply un-select the text.

string.noservers: No servers have been assigned to your account yet.
string.name: Name

notifications.updated: Your account notification preferences have been updated.

account.password: Your password has been successfully changed! Please login again using your new password.
account.email: Your email address has been successfully updated to %s.

subuser.help: If you have recieved an email because you were added as a subuser on a server please enter that token in the box below.

footer.license: PufferPanel is licensed under a GPL-v3 License.

error.password_strength: Your password is not complex enough. Please make sure to include at least one number, and some type of mixed case. Your new password must also be at least 8 characters long.
error.invalid_email: The email you provided is not valid.

account.same_email: Sorry, you can't change your email to the email address you are currently using for the account, that wouldn't make sense!

error.xsrf: The XSRF token received was not valid. Please make sure cookies are enabled and try your request again.
error.password_mismatch: The passwords you provided did not match each other.
error.unhandled: An unhandled error occured while processing this request. Please go back and try again.
error.invalid_password: We were unable to verify your account password. Please try your request again.

notice.noServers: You do not currently have any servers listed on your account.
notice.viewingAsAdmin: You are viewing this server listing as an admin. As such, all servers installed on the system are displayed. Any servers that you are set as the owner of are marked with a green dot to the left of their name.
notice.totpConfigure: Please verify your TOTP settings by scanning the QR Code to the right with your phone's authenticator application, and then enter the 6 number code generated by the application in the box below. Press the enter key when finished.
notice.totpSupport: You must have a TOTP supporting application (e.g Google Authenticator, DUO Mobile) to use this option.
notice.totpDisabled: It appears that you do not have Two-Factor authentication enabled. This method of authentication adds an additional barrier preventing unauthorized entry to your account. If you enable it you will be required to input a code generated on your phone or other TOTP supporting device before finishing your login.
notice.disableTotp: In order to disable TOTP on this account you will need to provide a valid TOTP token. Once validated TOTP protection on this account will be disabled.
